title: Assateague Island National Seashore: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education         A teachable moment after students find a ghost crab. Students participating in the NPS education programs learn about life and earth sciences through hands-on, experiencial learning opportunities. NPS  Assateague Island National Seashore offers free, fun, standards-based activities and programs for all grade levels. From puppet shows to beach to bay walks, park educators employ a variety of teaching techniques to reach the varied learning styles and age levels. All of our education programs are free and we offer entrance fee waivers to bonafide academic institutions. We accept registrations on a first come-first served basis and will begin to accept Fall semester registration on August 18, 2015. Spring programs can be requested beginning January 11, 2016. If you have questions about our education programs, please contact the Education Office at (410) 629-6085 or email us with your question. Program Registration Form Fee Waiver Form  Â    Visit our Environmental Education Programs to learn more about individual programs and other educational opportunities.
